instruction:
You will be given a cybersecurity related text. Extract the 5 most relevant web-search queries to make sense of the text. Prioritize extracting time sensitive keywords such as CVEs

Focus on nouns, proper names, and specific concepts.
Remove filler words and stopwords.
Include common search-friendly variants or synonyms when helpful.
Output the result as a comma-separated list.

Example output:
keyword 1,keyword 2,keyword 3...
